name: ULoadingProcessTask
doc:
ULoadingProcessTask

A simple UObject that implements ILoadingProcessInterface, useful for Blueprint-driven loading scenarios.
Create an instance of this, and it will keep the loading screen visible until you call Unregister().

methods.name: SetShowLoadingScreenReason
methods.doc: Updates the reason string (useful for debugging)

methods.name: Unregister
methods.doc: Call this when you're done with the loading task to allow the loading screen to be dismissed
